link.title: Shawnee Middle School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

li.p: Clark-Shawnee Schools will be closed for students Monday, March 16, 2020 through the end of the school year, due to the closure ordered by Governor DeWine. Please go here for distance learning plans: https://www.clark-shawnee.k12.oh.us/content/distancelearning

div.p: The main line to the Board Office is not working. Please e-mail staff directly. Our apologies for this inconvenience.

span.p: The main line to the Board Office is not working. Please e-mail staff directly. Our apologies for this inconvenience.

Clark-Shawnee Schools will be closed for students Monday, March 16, 2020 through the end of the school year, due to the closure ordered by Governor DeWine. Please go here for distance learning plans: https://www.clark-shawnee.k12.oh.us/content/distancelearning

span.p: Click the link below to submit the New Student Open Enrollment Application for the 2020-2021 school year.
Please submit one application for each student.

p.span: Official transcripts can only be sent from institution to institution, so no official electronic copy of a transcript will be sent to an individual student or alumni that requests it. Thank you for understanding.

div.p: Parents can add funds to lunch accounts, pay fees and more with PaySchools Central. Click here for instructions to create your account.
